section.title: Dialogs
section.para: Dialogs are used as secondary windows, to provide specific information or to ask questions.

listitem.para: The Project setup dialog contains the general settings for the project. The only field in the project setup dialog that will be used in the first version is the sample rate.
The Preferences dialog contains preferences for the application that aren't specific to a particular project. what preferences will the this version support?
The device setup dialog is where the audio driver is selected
The Sample Editor allows audio data to be viewed and manipulated. All the processing and editing performed in the Sample Editor is non-destructive.
